content.rendered:
Laura has over 20 years of experience working in high end salons and spas, working alongside celebrity stylists and as a Colour Educator for Davines. This is evident in her attention to detail to her hairdressing and passion for colour makeovers.

Laura approaches hairdressing with pinpoint accuracy – No stone is left unturned when she is choosing your new look, or even maintaining your current one. She is an exceptionally strong cutter and specialises in extensive colour correction, balayage and signature colour melts.

“My passion for hair, eye for colour selection and ongoing relationships with clients means you will always leave the salon feeling amazing”

Laura was also a Top 100 Global Finalist in Davines’ Talent Green House Competition, 2024. Co-creating with an international network of passionate hair professionals has expanded Laura’s creativity flare that she is excited to share with both exisiting and new clients.

Availability: Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays and every 2nd Saturday.
